author: bigboy-pdb-spam
body:
# Steps to reproduce

Create a new dotnet classlib project using:

```powershell
dotnet new classlib --name Test
```

Create the following file in the project folder:

```csharp
// File: ./Test/Test.cs

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace Test {
    public class Test {
        public static void f(IEnumerable<string> strings) {
            foreach (string s in strings) {
                Console.WriteLine(s);
            }
        }
        public static void f(string s) {
            Console.WriteLine(s);
        }
    }
}
```

Compile the project and import the class:

```powershell
cd .\Test\
dotnet build
Import-Module "$($pwd)\bin\Debug\netstandard2.0\Test.dll"
```

The output is as expected when using a System.Collections.Generic.List\<string\> object:

```powershell
$s = [System.Collections.Generic.List[string]]::new()
$s.Add('a') | Out-Null; $s.Add('b') | Out-Null
[Test.Test]::f($s)
# Output
# a
# b
```

Although, not for non-generic objects:

```powershell
$a = @('a','b')
[Test.Test]::f($a)
``` 

# Expected behavior

If PowerShell CAN detect that the array only consists of strings:

```none
a
b
```

If PowerShell CANNOT detect that the array only consists of strings:

```none
Error (since $a is not a generic type and does not extend the System.String class)
```

# Actual behavior

The array appears to be converted into a string:

```none
a b
```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.2
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.2
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17763
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Array Cast To String When Calling Class Library Function Expecting Generic Enumerable String Object
